Reviews.Title: Great product.
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: Well built computer solid construction. Lots of cool features from Asus. runs any game i throw at it on max settings.

Reviews.Title: bad item recieved
Reviews.Author: v620
Reviews.Content: machine refuses to turn on at times I guess im just stuck with a bad purchase. its just a pitty im all the way in ja I guess its my loss

ProductInfo.Features:
Asus G750JW-BBI7N05 - Windows 8 64-bit
Intel Quad-Core i7-4700HQ 2.40GHz with Turbo Boost Technology up to 3.40GHz - 8GB RAM - 1TB HDD - DVD±RW
17.3" (1920x1080) - FULL HD LED-Backlit - NVIDIA Ge Force GTX 765M with 2GB dedicated video memory - 802.11b/g/n - Bluetooth - 10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet
Webcam - Backlit Keyboard - Built-in Internal Speakers - Built-in Microphone
(4) USB 3.0 - (1) HDMI - (1) VGA - (1) Mini-Display Port - (1) Headphone Jack - (1)Microphone Jack - Digital Media Card Reader - 8-cell Lithium-ion
